synopsis.text: In a twist of fate, a tiny, abandoned kitten named Chibi-neko crosses paths with Tokio, a young man grappling with the disappointments of life. Despite his mother's allergies and apprehension towards felines, Tokio manages to convince her to let Chibi-neko stay, providing the little cat a loving home. Chibi-neko, who harbors dreams of becoming human and perceives herself as one, develops a deep affection for Tokio. However, their bond is tested when a charismatic wild cat, Raphael, enters their lives, challenging Chibi-neko's beliefs and introducing her to the enigmatic Cottonland, a place where dreams are said to come true. As Chibi-neko navigates the complexities of the human world and her own identity, she must determine where she truly belongs.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
